alert.note: Alert for Blackfoot Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 12 at 7:09PM MST until January 14 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM MST SATURDAY... ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST SATURDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM SATURDAY TO 5 PM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the Blizzard Warning, blizzard conditions. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 25 below zero. For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Grace, Soda Springs, Henry, and Bone. * WHEN...For the Blizzard Warning, until 4 AM MST Saturday. For the Wind Chill Warning, until 8 AM MST Saturday. For the Winter Storm Warning, from 5 PM Saturday to 5 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
